name: Astral Memory
description:
This project's purpose was mainly educational and its aim was to develop a game mechanic in a short period of time to simulate a technical interview assignment.

It is a memory game where the focus was aim towards the main mechanic and the UI mechanic, rather than the graphics.

Assets and idea taken and studied from https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WinNPWFCGC
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/12ZqKAHWji6oEOpnieILStrMn1x3mIXGt?usp=sharing
